title: English Writing Competency Enhancement Program Using Reflective Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing proficiency and comprehension of logical writing structures
context.additional_context: Aims to improve science students' English writing skills when composing research reports. Provides personalized feedback using learners' mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners analyze their writing processes through reflective journaling and derive at least three improvement strategies.
Learners produce a 500-word scientific report draft applying academic writing structures based on peer feedback.
Learners correct over 80% of writing errors using formative assessment tools on mobile platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
